    • Field Detail

      • x

        public int x
        The x, y and z positions of the seat within the plane in model co-ordinates x is forwards, y is up and z is left

      • y

        public int y
        The x, y and z positions of the seat within the plane in model co-ordinates x is forwards, y is up and z is left

      • z

        public int z
        The x, y and z positions of the seat within the plane in model co-ordinates x is forwards, y is up and z is left

      • id

        public int id
        The id of this seat

      • minYaw

        public float minYaw
        Limits for the look vector of the seat. Range is -360 to 360. Thus any range should lie in here without having to wrap

      • maxYaw

        public float maxYaw
        Limits for the look vector of the seat. Range is -360 to 360. Thus any range should lie in here without having to wrap

      • minPitch

        public float minPitch
        Limits for the look vector of the seat. Range is -90 to 90, but don't go beyond +/-89 or the view will mess up at the poles

      • maxPitch

        public float maxPitch
        Limits for the look vector of the seat. Range is -90 to 90, but don't go beyond +/-89 or the view will mess up at the poles

      • gunType

        public com.flansmod.common.guns.GunType gunType
        The gun this seat requires. As of 1.6.2, seats and planes will require specific guns as opposed to being completely open to anything

      • gunName

        public java.lang.String gunName
        The name of the gun model this seat is connected to. Gun model names are specified in the model files

      • part

        public EnumDriveablePart part
        The part of the driveable this seat is connected to.

      • gunnerID

        public int gunnerID
        Auto assigned by driveable type. Indicates what ammo slot the gun should take from

      • rotatedOffset

        public com.flansmod.common.vector.Vector3f rotatedOffset
        For turret mounted seats on tanks, the seat will be positioned differently according to this offset and the yaw of the turret

      • gunOrigin

        public com.flansmod.common.vector.Vector3f gunOrigin
        Where the bullets come from

    • Constructor Detail

      • Seat

        public Seat(java.lang.String[] split)
        Type file constructor. Line from type file should be of one of the following forms Passenger ID x y z Passenger ID x y z minYaw maxYaw minPitch maxPitch Passenger ID x y z minYaw maxYaw minPitch maxPitch gunType.shortName gunName

      • Seat

        public Seat(int dx,
            int dy,
            int dz)
        Type file driver seat constructor. Line from type file should be of one of the following forms Driver x y z Pilot x y z

      • Seat

        public Seat(int dx,
            int dy,
            int dz,
            float y1,
            float y2,
            float p1,
            float p2)
        Type file driver seat constructor with yaw and pitch limiters
